front.title: DHCPv6 Server Reply Sequence Number Option

abstract.t: This memo defines the Server Reply Sequence Number option for theDynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6 (DHCPv6). This optionis sent from a DHCPv6 server to a DHCPv6 relay agent to allow a relayagent to detect proper sequencing of Relay-Reply messages that couldbe delivered out of order.
